content: But when I think more longer term on this, I feel like we've built this business that top line growth can be in that let's say upper single digits all the way up into the to mid-teens and I also believe that as we said, even a little while back, our midterm trajectory was north of 15% EBITDA, I think we're structurally pretty close to that and, so I think that trajectory really looked like that out over the next several quarters.
